title: Tandoor
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian food menu, while meat-heavy, also offers a vegetarian section that includes several soups and appetizers and 16 main entrees. Lunch buffet has vegan items alongside non-veg. Comfortable dining room with tables spaced to allow private conversation. Family run. Previously at Clark Rd.
